duties_responsibilities.duty: Plan and execute audits to assess governance, risk management, and controls in place to mitigate business risks.
Develop the Annual Audit Plan for USA & Curacao and prioritize assignments based on risk assessment.
Ensure audits are conducted in line with established policies, procedures, and industry standards.
Review all activities of FAB USA Portfolio and related middle office, back office, and risk management activities.
Conduct audits to assess risk classification, governance, and internal control procedures.
Review and finalize audit reports, discuss findings with management, and negotiate Management Action Plans.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree. Relevant post-graduate qualification and/or relevant professional qualification and/or certification desirable.
